page.title: 11LOCAL ACCESS ROUTES.
page.content: While easing congestion on the old A13 the new road has spoiled trade for the Orsett Cock Pub and Garage since it creates a by-pass.The garage has since ceased trading as such and is merely a car sales centre now.The only petrol station is on the London bound side of the Stanford Road approaching the roundabout. South of the roundabout the A128 gives access firstly to the Orsett Container Depot then the Orsett Golf Course and ultimately Chadwell-St.-Mary and Tilbury.The Golf Course is for members only.
